mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Project ( name, description, start_date, end_date, github_repo_url, daily_report_time, status ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{description}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{githubRepoUrl}, #{dailyReportTime}, 'ACTIVE' )

INSERT INTO ProjectMember (project_id, user_id, role, status, joined_at) VALUES
(#{m.projectId}, #{m.userId}, #{m.role}, #{m.status}, #{m.joinedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE Project SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, github_repo_url = #{githubRepoUrl}, end_date = #{endDate}, daily_report_time = #{dailyReportTime}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND deleted_at IS NULL AND status = 'ACTIVE'
UPDATE Project SET status = #{status}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE Project SET deleted_at = #{deletedAt}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT p.project_id, p.name, p.description, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.github_repo_url, p.daily_report_time, p.status FROM Project p INNER JOIN ProjectMember pm ON p.project_id = pm.project_id WHERE pm.user_id = #{userId} AND p.status = 'ACTIVE' AND p.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY p.project_id DESC

SELECT p.project_id, p.name, p.description, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.github_repo_url, p.daily_report_time, p.status, p.updated_at FROM Project p INNER JOIN ProjectMember pm ON p.project_id = pm.project_id WHERE pm.user_id = #{userId} AND p.status = 'DONE' AND p.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY p.updated_at DESC

SELECT p.project_id, p.name, p.description, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.status, p.deleted_at FROM Project p INNER JOIN ProjectMember pm ON p.project_id = pm.project_id WHERE pm.user_id = #{userId} AND p.deleted_at IS NOT NULL ORDER BY p.deleted_at DESC
SELECT project_id, name, deleted_at FROM Project WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
